items.sentence: Something terrible is likely to happen if we don't leave right now.
I think Tom would like to know that you aren't planning to do that.
As soon as the accident occurred, a police car rushed to the scene.
Tom got his nose out of joint when he wasn't asked to Mary's party.
Tom punched a hole in the wall after his team lost the grand final.
Tom makes his bread with only 3 ingredients: flour, water and salt.
I'm beginning to believe that we actually might be able to do this.
The hardware store is now selling potted plants at a huge discount.
I put the book that I borrowed from you the other day on your desk.
In my opinion, Australia is one of the best countries in the world.
